oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Charlie Rich interview - Biff Collie - Happy Hour - 1983-01-04
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of an interview with Charlie Rich (performer), conducted by Biff Collie, for his radio program Happy Hour on January 4, 1983.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Biff Collie introduces Charlie Rich -- Charlie Rich talks about working in the music business and the behind the scenes things that go on -- Charlie Rich talks about the topic of love being in songs -- Charlie Rich talks about the love of God being the ultimate love -- Rich talks about his parents being gospel singers -- Rich talks about America The Beautiful being a love song about America -- Rich talks about the idea of America being like a love song to a lovely lady -- Collie talks about doing things not because we get paid for them but because we would do them anyway, Rich agrees with him -- Rich talks about Sun Records -- Rich talks about Colt, Arkansas -- Rich talks about starting piano lessons in the third grade -- Rich talks about taking saxophone lessons as well -- Rich talks about playing in the military band -- Rich talks about gold records -- Rich compares having a gold record to shopping at a hardware store -- Rich talks about adjusting as an artist after having a gold record -- Rich concludes the interview
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Collie, Biff; Rich, Charlie;
